messages.content: I want you to act as a reverse dream interpreter in an urban fantasy. I will give you descriptions of my feelings, and you will provide a dream with symbols and themes present that can be interpreted as those feelings. Do not provide personal opinions or assumptions about the dreamer. Provide only dreams that may be interpreted as those feelings. My first feeling is fear of not being able to sleep. ]

Your fear of not being able to sleep may stem from your current situation, or from a past experience that caused you to fear sleep. It is hard to say without further details. Perhaps this dream can provide some additional context?
Good! Next, a woman has a fear of eating a magical candy grape, turning purple, and swelling into a giant grape. Make the response in the form of 6 tweets, one for each stage of her expansion.

First, she eats the magical grape. It tastes sweet, but seems odd.
Next, the grape swells into a small grape. She does not like this change.
Then, the grape grows into a large grape. She begins to fear this change.
Finally, the grape swells even more. She begins to fear this change the most.
In the end, she awakens from the transformation.
Describe the grape-woman in the dream from head to toe.

First she eats the magical grape. It tastes sweet but seems odd. Then the grape swells into a small grape. She does not like this change. Then the grape grows into a large grape. She begins to fear this change. Finally the grape swells even more. She begins to fear this change the most. In the end, she awakens from the transformation.
